solution_line_template: Combining like terms and subtracting {cats_more_than_dogs} from both sides, we get {multiplier_for_dogs}d = {two_times_dogs}
Dividing both sides by {divisor_for_dogs}, we get d = {two_times_dogs}/{divisor_for_dogs} = <<{two_times_dogs}/{divisor_for_dogs}={num_dogs}>>{num_dogs}
